content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":123511,"originalJapaneseLine":"「その書類ってそんなに大事なものなの？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Is that document really that important?\""},{"lineNumber":123512,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええ？　別にそこまでは――」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh? Not really that much—\""},{"lineNumber":123513,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":123514,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":123515,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　＜にやぁー＞","translatedEnglishLine":"  <grin>"},{"lineNumber":123516,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そーそー、すっごーーく大事な書類だって。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah, yeah, it's a veeeery important document."},{"lineNumber":123517,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今日の軍議で絶対に必要って言ってたかな？」","translatedEnglishLine":"It was said to be absolutely necessary at today's military council, right?\""},{"lineNumber":123518,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え、そ、そうなの！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh, r-really!?\""},{"lineNumber":123519,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ……虎子のせいで作戦に支障が出て……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah... because of Torako, the operation got disrupted..."},{"lineNumber":123520,"originalJapaneseLine":"　沢山の人が死んじゃうかも……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Many people might end up dying...\""},{"lineNumber":123521,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う、うわーーーん！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wahhhhhh!\""},{"lineNumber":123522,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さようなら、虎子……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Goodbye, Torako..."},{"lineNumber":123523,"originalJapaneseLine":"　軍法会議にかけられて死刑になっても、","translatedEnglishLine":"Even if you're tried by a military tribunal and sentenced to death,"},{"lineNumber":123524,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私、あんたのこと忘れない……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I won't forget you...\""},{"lineNumber":123525,"originalJapaneseLine":"「虎子は思い出となって……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Torako will become a memory..."},{"lineNumber":123526,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私の中で永遠に生きるからね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"You will live forever inside me...\""},{"lineNumber":123527,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うわわわーーーーん！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Waaahhhh!"},{"lineNumber":123528,"originalJapaneseLine":"　優しくして！　虎子に優しくして！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Be nice! Be nice to Torako!\""},{"lineNumber":123529,"originalJapaneseLine":"「優しくして欲しけりゃ、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If you want kindness,"},{"lineNumber":123530,"originalJapaneseLine":"　とっとと見つけなさい」","translatedEnglishLine":"then hurry up and find it.\""},{"lineNumber":123531,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う、うん……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"O-Okay...\""},{"lineNumber":123532,"originalJapaneseLine":"「書類、書類どこー……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The document, where's the document...\""},{"lineNumber":123533,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なあ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey.\""},{"lineNumber":123534,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh?\""},{"lineNumber":123535,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さっきから言ってるのって、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What you've been talking about just now,"},{"lineNumber":123536,"originalJapaneseLine":"　これのことか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"is this it?\""},{"lineNumber":123537,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えっ、そ、それ、どこに！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh, t-that's, where is it!?\""},{"lineNumber":123538,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いや、さっき勝子が落としてたぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, Katsuko dropped it earlier.\""},{"lineNumber":123539,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh...\""},{"lineNumber":123540,"originalJapaneseLine":"勝子の顔から血の気がさっと引いた。","translatedEnglishLine":"The color quickly drained from Katsuko's face."},{"lineNumber":123541,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ……えっと……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah... um...\""},{"lineNumber":123542,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":123543,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、あの、虎子……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Uh, um, Torako..."},{"lineNumber":123544,"originalJapaneseLine":"　その、ごめんなさ――」","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, I'm sorry—\""},{"lineNumber":123545,"originalJapaneseLine":"「にやぁー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Grin\""},{"lineNumber":123546,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひいっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eek!\""},{"lineNumber":123547,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あれーーー？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huhhhh?\""},{"lineNumber":123548,"originalJapaneseLine":"　わたしのせいじゃなかったのかなー？","translatedEnglishLine":"Maybe it wasn't my fault after all?"},{"lineNumber":123549,"originalJapaneseLine":"　これってそーゆーことかなー？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Is that what this is about?\""},{"lineNumber":123550,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ねーねー、かつこー、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, hey, Katsuko,"},{"lineNumber":123551,"originalJapaneseLine":"　これはどーゆーことかなー？」","translatedEnglishLine":"what's going on here?\""},{"lineNumber":123552,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ち、ちが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I-It's not like that...\""},{"lineNumber":123553,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えー？　なになにー？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh? What, what?\""},{"lineNumber":123554,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なにがちがうのー？","translatedEnglishLine":"What's different?\""},{"lineNumber":123555,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ねーねーおしえてよー？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Come on, tell me!\""},{"lineNumber":123556,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh...\""},{"lineNumber":123557,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うわぁん……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Waaah...\""},{"lineNumber":123558,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":123559,"originalJapaneseLine":"（こいつら本当は仲いいんじゃ……）","translatedEnglishLine":"(These two probably really get along well...)"},{"lineNumber":123560,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":123561,"originalJapaneseLine":"「んふ……ふふふ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Nfu... fufufu...\""},{"lineNumber":123562,"originalJapaneseLine":"テントの中で勝子が手紙を読みながら","translatedEnglishLine":"Inside the tent, Katsuko was reading a letter"},{"lineNumber":123563,"originalJapaneseLine":"ニヤニヤとしていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"with a sly grin."},{"lineNumber":123564,"originalJapaneseLine":"（……あいつ何してんだ？）","translatedEnglishLine":"(...What is she up to?)"},{"lineNumber":123565,"originalJapaneseLine":"そして手紙を置いて――","translatedEnglishLine":"Then she put down the letter—"},{"lineNumber":123566,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はあ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Sigh...\""},{"lineNumber":123567,"originalJapaneseLine":"大きく溜め息をついた。","translatedEnglishLine":"She let out a big sigh."},{"lineNumber":123568,"originalJapaneseLine":"「で、この手紙はなんだ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So, what's this letter about?\""},{"lineNumber":123569,"originalJapaneseLine":"「きゃあ！？　いつの間に！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kyaa!? When did you get here!?\""},{"lineNumber":123570,"originalJapaneseLine":"「って、ちょっと！　見ないで下さい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, wait! Don't look at that!\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その書類ってそんなに大事なものなの？」
「そーそー、すっごーーく大事な書類だって。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah, yeah, it's a veeeery important document.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日の軍議で絶対に必要って言ってたかな？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was said to be absolutely necessary at today's military council, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ……虎子のせいで作戦に支障が出て……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah... because of Torako, the operation got disrupted...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 沢山の人が死んじゃうかも……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Many people might end up dying..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 軍法会議にかけられて死刑になっても、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even if you're tried by a military tribunal and sentenced to death,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私、あんたのこと忘れない……」
私の中で永遠に生きるからね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You will live forever inside me..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 優しくして！　虎子に優しくして！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Be nice! Be nice to Torako!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とっとと見つけなさい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: then hurry up and find it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さっきから言ってるのって、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What you've been talking about just now,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや、さっき勝子が落としてたぞ」
勝子の顔から血の気がさっと引いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The color quickly drained from Katsuko's face.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わたしのせいじゃなかったのかなー？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe it wasn't my fault after all?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これってそーゆーことかなー？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is that what this is about?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これはどーゆーことかなー？」
ねーねーおしえてよー？」
（こいつら本当は仲いいんじゃ……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (These two probably really get along well...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: テントの中で勝子が手紙を読みながら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Inside the tent, Katsuko was reading a letter
Then she put down the letter—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大きく溜め息をついた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She let out a big sigh.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「って、ちょっと！　見ないで下さい！」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

私の中で永遠に生きるからね……」
